Kalibo, Aklan | cable chan 6 = Channel 96 | adsl serv 1 = | adsl chan 1 = }} '''Universal Channel''' is a television channel specializing in movies and television series in the [[Thriller (genre)|thriller]], [[Drama (genre)|drama]], [[Comedy]], [[Crime (genre)|crime]] and investigation genres. It is owned by [[NBC Universal Global Networks]], with a partnership with [[Solar Entertainment Corporation]]. ==History== [[image:SciFi_channel.svg|thumb|110px|left|Sci Fi Channel logo used from April 1, 2009 to July 25, 2010]] The launched on April 1, 2009, Specializing in [[science fiction]], [[fantasy]] and [[Horror film|horror]] shows and movies. [http://www.philstar.com/Article.aspx?articleId=455083&publicationSubCategoryId=70 NBC Universal Global launches SCI FI in RP] Retrieved via www.philstar.com.ph on April 04, 2009. As of July 26, 2010 Sci Fi Channel (Philippines) will be replaced with world's most popular cable and satellite channel, [[Universal Channel]] while Sci Fi Channel (Asia) will be rebranded as [[Syfy Universal (Asia)]] as the same day. ==Programming== ===Current Programs=== * ''[[Criminal Minds]]'' * ''[[The Event (TV series)|The Event]]'' * ''[[Flashpoint (TV series)|Flashpoint]]'' * ''[[Fringe
